pullRequest.title: Add functionality to rerun failed tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Implement Rerun failed test cases functionality
Fixes #24642
Approach

Describe how you are implementing the solutions along with the design details.

Samples

Provide high-level details about the samples related to this feature.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

Can these comments can be removed?

commit.message: Add functionality to rerun failed tests

nodes.bodyText: Once the new package implementation is in place, we should allow running with the -a flag. Please create an issue to track this.
We should catch the exception and close the BufferedReader. Lets wrap this with a try-with-resources block.
Lets add a test case to verify the behavior when there are are no failed tests found.
